BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_SHOP_REV_ALLOTMENT_DTL (NUM_HOSPITAL_ID, STR_ALLOTEE_REFERENCE_NO, STR_TYPE, NUM_SHOP_ID, GNUM_SLNO_S, NUM_REVENUE_GEN_ID, NUM_SLNO_REV, NUM_REV_GEN_CAT_ID, NUM_SLNO_REV_CAT, STR_ALLOTEE_NAME, STR_ALLOTEE_ADDRESS, NUM_RESI_NUMBER, NUM_MOBILE_NUMBER, NUM_TENDER_DETAILS_MONTHS, STR_TENDER_DETAILS_YEARS, STR_SANCTION_ORDER_NUMBER, DT_SANCTION_ORDER_DATE, DT_ALLOTMENT_DATE, DT_ALLOTMENT_VALIDITY_DATE, STR_RENT_SUBMISSION_UNIT, NUM_RENT_SUBMIT_DAY, DT_POSSESSION_DATE, NUM_CONTRACT_PERIOD, STR_CONTRACT_PERIOD_UNIT, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,STR_STATUS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_SHOP_MST SET STR_STATUS='A' WHERE NUM_SHOP_ID=?
DELETE FROM EST_SHOP_REV_ALLOTMENT_EXT_DTL A WHERE STR_ALLOTEE_REFERENCE_NO=?
DELETE FROM EST_SHOP_REV_ALLOT_PENALTY_DTL A WHERE STR_ALLOTEE_REFERENCE_NO=?

UPDATE EST_SHOP_REV_ALLOTMENT_DTL SET STR_ALLOTEE_ADDRESS=?, NUM_RESI_NUMBER=?, NUM_MOBILE_NUMBER=?,NUM_TENDER_DETAILS_MONTHS=?, STR_TENDER_DETAILS_YEARS=?, STR_SANCTION_ORDER_NUMBER=?, DT_SANCTION_ORDER_DATE=?, DT_ALLOTMENT_DATE=?, DT_ALLOTMENT_VALIDITY_DATE=?, STR_RENT_SUBMISSION_UNIT=?, NUM_RENT_SUBMIT_DAY=?, DT_POSSESSION_DATE=?, NUM_CONTRACT_PERIOD=?, STR_CONTRACT_PERIOD_UNIT=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE STR_ALLOTEE_REFERENCE_NO=? AND NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?
